version_description: Critical fixes

Bug fixes and stability improvements.
Now able to record video on FAT32 and EXFAT filesystem formats.

Now, you can more easily use iBridge camera to record video and photos directly onto your Leef device.
---
Fixes for recording video on iPhone 6s and 6s+.
iBridge camera photos now save properly.
General improvements for compatibility with iOS
Bug fixes and performance enhancements for iACCESS users.
Several bug fixes and performance enhancements.

Added support for .MTS video files.
Stability improvements for iACCESS users.
Various bug fixes.

At Leef, we are always making improvements based on our customers' feedback. Thanks for your help!
This update includes:
- A firmware update for iAccess reader that improves speed and stability for high capacity microSD cards.

This update includes several small fixes, including:
‣ Added localization for iAccess firmware updater. This includes translations for 18 languages.
‣ When deleting multiple folders, sometimes one folder remained. Now both folders will be removed.
Compatibility and file system improvements.
This release includes bug fixes.

This release contains some drive compatibility fixes.
Privacy Settings for iOS 10

Leef’s biggest update ever is here!

Here's what we did:
● Improved file stability and performance
● Reduced battery consumption
● Reduced the overall size of the app by more than 50%
● Made the video player faster and more stable

Thanks for your feedback on the MobileMemory 3.0 update! We've already made some changes to improve your experience:

Bugfixes:
- Audio playback is now working with Control Center
- You're now able to open 'write protected' files

Thanks for using MobileMemory!

We made the following changes to improve stability:
- Fixed crashes on iOS 10.2.0 Beta.
- Fixed an issue with deleting the last photo from Preview.
- Fixed crashes in Music where navigation between tabs crash

We are constantly working on improvements to the MobileMemory experience. Thanks for your feedback!
- Fixed crashes while caching (iOS 10.2)
- Photo rotation in preview.
- 3D touch for previewing photos and videos.
- Properly functioning searc

- Thumbnails in File Manager.
- Search in Media.
- Fast Slider for better navigation in Photos.
- Bug fixes & optimizations.

We appreciate your feedback in helping us make MobileMemory better and better!

- Audio player/playlist improvements
- Video player: Zoom in/zoom out feature
- Media screens load faster

We appreciate your feedback in helping us make MobileMemory better and better!

In this update:
- Video subtitles.

We are constantly updating the MobileMemory experience based on your feedback.

- Audio track selection for videos with multiple languages.
